content.raw:
Thanks Arthur, appreciate it! Yes, quick and dirty sounds good at this point. 

I actually just found another workaround too… it is only “broadcast” that is not working. I believe my manual service call caused “X2N2” to be added to the list of neighbors, which got things rolling. If I replace `client->SendTo(encoded, "broadcast");` with all possible robot names, that is also working.
content.html:
Thanks Arthur, appreciate it! Yes, quick and dirty sounds good at this point.

I actually just found another workaround too… it is only “broadcast” that is not working. I believe my manual service call caused “X2N2” to be added to the list of neighbors, which got things rolling. If I replace client->SendTo(encoded, "broadcast"); with all possible robot names, that is also working.
